{{Description|A claw-snapping crab that can be found in various water bodies throughout Teyvat.<br />It has a light red colored shell and a gentle nature. As such, it's a lot more suitable to be raised for ornamental display than others of its kind.|[[Archive]] Description}}
'''Pale Red Crab''' is a type of crab which can be can be found both as [[Wildlife]] and as a pet for the [[Serenitea Pot]].

Outdoor creatures, as the name implies, can only be placed in outdoor spaces within the Serenitea Pot.

==Drops==
{{Card|Crab|1}}

Catching one for the first time will add this creature's entry into your in-game [[archive]].
